thread.title: Peak Commercial Real-Estate Prices Force Investors to Get Creative

author: Peter Grant
title: Peak Commercial Real-Estate Prices Force Investors to Get Creative
text:
As 2017 came to an end, the good news for commercial real-estate investors was that values were near peak levels in many markets throughout the world, putting in the black most anything they bought in the past eight years.
The bad news as 2018 begins: Values in many markets throughout the world are near peak levels. That is going to make buying property this year particularly tricky.
